other_tests.findings: Changes consistent with chronic HBV infection, moderate disease activity, moderate-to-severe fibrosis, moderate large-droplet fatty change, mild hepatocytic and Kupffer cell iron overload.
other_tests.changes_over_time: No changes in serological test results for HBV; transaminase levels remained elevated.

other_tests.findings: HBsAg positive, HBsAb negative, HBeAg positive
Suppression of HBV DNA to an undetectable level.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Elevated HBV DNA level at 1370 pg/mL in July 2001 after stopping lamivudine therapy.
